request.description: **Get details for a specific subscription plan**

header.value: Content-Type, Content-Length, Accept-Encoding, X-CSRF-Token, Authorization, accept, origin, Cache-Control, X-Requested-With
POST, OPTIONS, GET, PUT, DELETE, PATCH

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Premium Tier",
    "price": 2000,
    "validity_days": 30,
    "access_level": "premium",     // free/basic/premium
    "max_devices_allowed": 4,
    "resolution": "4k",
    "description": "The premium tier plan",
    "is_active": true
}

request.description: **Admin: Creates new subscription plan w/ price, duration, access_level,etc.**

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Basic Tier",
    "price": 100,
    "validity_days": 30,
    "access_level": "basic",     // free/basic/premium
    "max_devices_allowed": 2,
    "resolution": "1080p",
    "description": "The basic tier plan",
    "is_active": true
}
